Activity: Log in, check emails and alerts. Review the progress on monitoring and prepare for providing technical support.
Test the deployed infrastructure and monitoring system with simulated trading activity. Identify any performance bottlenecks or issues.
Address any issues identified during testing. Optimize infrastructure configurations and monitoring thresholds.
Prepare documentation and training materials for the trading and research teams on how to use the deployed infrastructure and monitoring system.
Lunch break. Read a book related to system design.
Make myself available to the trading and research teams for technical support. Respond to inquiries and troubleshoot issues as they arise. Track support requests in a ticketing system (e.g., Jira).
Review the infrastructure upgrade options discussed with the lead architect. Begin drafting a detailed plan for the upgrades, including timelines, resource requirements, and potential risks.
Check emails and prepare for the next day.
